question: In a kitchen design, what should be included on one side of the sink, with a width of at least 24 inches, and on the other side, with a width of at least 18 inches?<image 1>
description: The image depicts a kitchen design layout with specific measurements for the placement of appliances and fixtures. The top view shows a sink with dimensions of 24 inches by 16 inches. To the right of the sink, there is a dishwasher with dimensions of 18 inches by 16 inches. Below these elements, the side view shows the sink and dishwasher installed in a counter with cabinets below. The counter space next to the sink is labeled with measurements: 18 inches on the left side and 24 inches on the right side.
